item.title: IDEA远程调试docker容器
item.author: 李森
item.description: 远程 Debug 配置 IDEA中添加Remote JVM Debug配置项，拷贝以下配置 1 -agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=*:5005 容器启动配置 dockerfile配置 1 2 3 4 5 FROM openjdk:8 ADD ./myapp.jar ./ EXPOSE 8082 EXPOSE 5005 ENTRYPOINT ["java","-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5005","-jar","myapp.jar","--spring.profiles.active=prod"]
